title: Some years ago I met Andy Griffin while attending church in Manteo. He had just been awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom and brought it to church for the people to see. I talked with him and when I said I was from Burgaw he said he used to own a home in Wilmington (I believe he said Landfall). Whether the home was in his name or some company name he did not say.
